mapper.select: SELECT nacl FROM `acl_ruacl` where `rdcid` =#{rdcid} and `userid` =#{uid} LIMIT 1;
SELECT u.nacl unacl,r.nacl rnacl ,g.nacl gnacl from acl_user u LEFT JOIN acl_role r on r.id=u.roleid LEFT JOIN acl_group g on g.id=r.gid where u.uid=#{uid} LIMIT 1;
SELECT m.* , if(find_in_set(m.id,#{nacl})>0 or find_in_set(m.pid,#{nacl})>0,0,1) as acl from coldmenus m ;
SELECT m.* , if(find_in_set(m.id,#{nacl})>0 or find_in_set(m.pid,#{nacl})>0,0,1) as acl from coldmenus m where pid=#{pid} ;
